name: Pick'n'Chew
description:
Simple, fun and addictive feeding game where calories don’t matter.
Pick the right meal and drag it to your hungry visitor’s tray - it’s really that simple! In between serving food, collecting payments and keeping up with your goals, make sure you mind the clock. It’s fun and easy to play for everyone!

Features:
• Make dudes happy by serving them tons of organic food
• Two eye-popping graphic themes
• Two exciting game modes to play
• Quick start and zero learning curve
• Earn coins to upgrade your yummy power-ups
• Compete against your friends on the Game Center leaderboard
• Improve your feeding skills

How many hungry kids have YOU fed today?
